Name: There's a Butcher Around
About the game: There's a Butcher Around, a brutal hide & seek. Bill the butcher has escaped from the asylum and is looking for new victims. During the game you will have to find a place to hide, remembering that your friends are also trying to hide from the butcher. Every round, Bill the butcher chooses a spot to investigate, are you well hidden? The main goal is to be the last survivor, so find the best place to hide. Game contains a climate of terror, suspense and lots of blood, plus some references of our taste. Features: 17 playable characters 7 maps Tense atmosphere Fun gameplay Pixel art Full Compatibility with Control Steam Achievements
